summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Panel v2.1 - all features working correctly. 25/25 backend tests passed, all frontend tabs functional.

issues: Minor: duplicate 'Initializing secure connection...' message appears twice in terminal log on first load (register + animation both fire the same message)

critical_code_review_comments: server.py is ~627 lines - approaching the 700-line threshold, consider splitting into routers
No authentication middleware on admin API endpoints - any caller can approve/block visitors or delete pages without auth token (no JWT/session auth on REST endpoints, only login endpoint exists)
startup event uses deprecated @app.on_event('startup') - should migrate to lifespan context manager in newer FastAPI versions
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_ prefixed visitors, pages, targets, scans, vulnerabilities, alerts during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working. Admin login at /admin with University@007. Visitor page at / shows terminal loading screen. Backend fully tested with pytest. Key concern: no auth on admin CRUD endpoints (anyone can call /api/visitors/{id}/approve without being logged in).
rca_of_issues: No critical issues found. Minor: visitor loading page shows duplicate first message because register() calls addMessage() and the useEffect animation also fires immediately on status=pending change.
